subject: Lacrosse
College Athletics
NCAA Lacrosse Championships
lead_paragraph: Colin Igoe scored three goals, four of his teammates had two each, and Notre Dame beat Penn, 13-6, in the first round of the N.C.A.A. men’s lacrosse tournament in South Bend, Ind.
snippet: Colin Igoe scored three goals, four of his teammates had two each, and Notre Dame beat Penn, 13-6, in the first round of the N.C.A.A. men’s lacrosse tournament in South Bend, Ind.
